Github Release Legacy Variant APK (File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 从多选菜单进行随机播放时偶尔崩溃
  2. 修复 在 Android 15 及其以上，设置向导的按钮被导航栏遮挡
  3. 修复 除非暂停播放，速度设置不生效 (自v1.11.0)
  4. 修复 页脚着色设置不立即生效
  5. 修复 服务退出后自动媒体库刷新失败
  6. 改进 统一所有设置对话框的样式
  7. 改进 提升文件页中加载速度
  8. 改进 同步进度通知发送节流
  9. 新增 支持自动跳过队列中的不可播放项 (可选)
  10. 修改 静音部分通知，更新通知渠道
  11. 修改 更新不适合的网格大小警告条件
  12. 修改 限制小部件图像分辨率，以防止在刷新时崩溃
  13. 开发 更新 Kotlin 至 2.2.20, 更新依赖
  14. 开发 清理代码
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: occasional crash when using 'shuffle all' from the multi-selection menu
  2. Fix: buttons in Startup Guide blocked by navigation bar on Android 15 and above
  3. Fix: speed settings could be applied unless it's paused (since v1.11.0)
  4. Fix: color footer settings not taking effect immediately
  5. Fix: automatic library refresh failing once Service quits
  6. Improve: standardize styles across all settings dialogs
  7. Improve: accelerate loading speed in Files Tab
  8. Improve: throttle Sync Progress notifications
  9. New: support of automatically skipping unplayable items in queue (optional)
  10. Modify: mute some notifications, and update notification channels
  11. Modify: update conditions for warning inappropriate grid size
  12. Modify: limit image resolution to prevent crashes by App Widgets refreshing
  13. Development: upgrade Kotlin to 2.2.20, update dependencies
  14. Development: cleanup codes
